name: Coding Monster
body:
> **Yeah, yeah this site was generated by github for me...** 

Here are the projects that are working on at the moment:

### [angular-cc-autorefresh](https://github.com/christianacca/angular-cc-autorefresh)

> AngularJS directives to schedule work that refreshes $scope.

### [Cache-Abstraction](https://github.com/christianacca/Cache-Abstraction)

> A simple yet extensible cache abstraction for the .net framework.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
